summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3930 for the improvement of Fremont Avenue from the south margin of North 34th Street to North 36th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the installation of a street lighting system, under Ordinance No. 47834, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
